snippets.script:
<script>
    import {
        Box,
        Mosaic,
        Text,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Mosaic sizing="medium" spacing="large">
    <Box>
        <Text is="strong">NEUTRAL / DEFAULT</Text>

        <Text>
            Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
            adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur orci.
            Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis
            sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum tellus, in
            iaculis dolor tincidunt non.
        </Text>
    </Box>

    <Box palette="accent">
        <Text is="strong">ACCENT</Text>

        <Text>
            Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
            adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur orci.
            Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis

    </Box>

            Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis
            sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum tellus, in

    </Box>

    <Box palette="light">

            Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis
            sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum tellus, in
            iaculis dolor tincidunt non.
        </Text>
    </Box>

    <Box palette="alert">
        <Text is="strong">ALERT</Text>

        <Text>
            Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
            adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur orci.
            Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis
            sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum tellus, in
            iaculis dolor tincidunt non.
        </Text>
    </Box>

    <Box palette="affirmative">

        <Text>
            Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur

snippets.title: Box Elevation

snippets.script:
<script>
    import {
        Box,
        Mosaic,
        Text,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Mosaic sizing="medium" spacing="large">
    <Box padding="huge">
        <Text is="strong">NONE / DEFAULT</Text>

        <Text>
            Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
            adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur orci.
            Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis
            sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum tellus, in
            iaculis dolor tincidunt non.
        </Text>
    </Box>

    <Box shape="pill" padding="huge">
        <Text is="strong">PILL</Text>

        <Text>
            Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
            adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur orci.
            Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis
            sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum tellus, in
            iaculis dolor tincidunt non.
        </Text>
    </Box>

    <Box shape="rounded" padding="huge">
        <Text is="strong">ROUNDED</Text>

        <Text>
            Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
            adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur orci.
            Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis
            sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum tellus, in
            iaculis dolor tincidunt non.
        </Text>
    </Box>
</Mosaic>
snippets.title: Box Shape

Box.name: --box-palette-background-normal
Box.description: Controls the default RGB color value used for background.

Box.name: --box-palette-foreground-normal
Box.description: Controls the default RGB color value used for color.

Box.name: elevation
Box.description: Alters how "high" the Box appears to be off the page.

data.render:
Box

NOTE: New since v0.2.0.

Box is a surface primitive for encapsulating section content in a block of color.

<script>
    import {Box} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Box>This is a Box!</Box>

Imports

<script>
    import {Box} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

Palette

You can change the color palette of the Box via the palette property.

<script>
    import {
        Box,
        Mosaic,
        Text,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Mosaic sizing="medium" spacing="large">
    <Box>
        <Text is="strong">NEUTRAL / DEFAULT</Text>

        <Text>
            Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
            adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur orci.
            Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis
            sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum tellus, in
            iaculis dolor tincidunt non.
        </Text>
    </Box>

    <Box palette="accent">
        <Text is="strong">ACCENT</Text>

        <Text>
            Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
            adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur orci.
            Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis
            sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum tellus, in
            iaculis dolor tincidunt non.
        </Text>
    </Box>

    <Box palette="dark">
        <Text is="strong">DARK</Text>

        <Text>
            Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
            adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur orci.
            Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis
            sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum tellus, in
            iaculis dolor tincidunt non.
        </Text>
    </Box>

    <Box palette="light">
        <Text is="strong">LIGHT</Text>

        <Text>
            Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
            adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur orci.
            Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis
            sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum tellus, in
            iaculis dolor tincidunt non.
        </Text>
    </Box>

    <Box palette="alert">
        <Text is="strong">ALERT</Text>

        <Text>
            Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
            adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur orci.
            Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis
            sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum tellus, in
            iaculis dolor tincidunt non.
        </Text>
    </Box>

    <Box palette="affirmative">
        <Text is="strong">AFFIRMATIVE</Text>

        <Text>
            Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
            adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur orci.
            Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis
            sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum tellus, in
            iaculis dolor tincidunt non.

            Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
            adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur orci.
            Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis
            sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum tellus, in
            iaculis dolor tincidunt non.
        </Text>
    </Box>
</Mosaic>

Elevation

NOTE: New since v0.3.5.

You can set how "high" your Box will appear to be over top the page via the elevation property.

<script>
    import {
        Box,
        Mosaic,
        Text,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Mosaic sizing="medium" spacing="large">
    <Box>
        <Text is="strong">NONE / DEFAULT</Text>

        <Text>
            Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
            adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur orci.
            Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis
            sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum tellus, in
            iaculis dolor tincidunt non.
        </Text>
    </Box>

    <Box elevation="lowest">
        <Text is="strong">LOWEST</Text>

        <Text>
            Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
            adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur orci.
            Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis
            sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum tellus, in
            iaculis dolor tincidunt non.
        </Text>
    </Box>

    <Box elevation="low">

            Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis
            sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum tellus, in

        </Text>
    </Box>

    <Box elevation="medium">

        <Text>
            Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
            adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur orci.
            Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis
            sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum tellus, in
            iaculis dolor tincidunt non.
        </Text>
    </Box>

    <Box elevation="highest">
        <Text is="strong">HIGHEST</Text>

        <Text>
            Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
            adipiscing elit. Proin et consectetur orci.
            Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis
            sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum tellus, in

        </Text>
    </Box>
</Mosaic>

Shape

You can modify the shape of the Box via the shape property.

<script>
    import {
        Box,
        Mosaic,
        Text,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Mosaic sizing="medium" spacing="large">
    <Box padding="huge">
        <Text is="strong">NONE / DEFAULT</Text>

        <Text>

            Curabitur a egestas turpis, vitae convallis
            sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum tellus, in
            iaculis dolor tincidunt non.

    </Box>
